metadata.name: ModJam Vol. 2 (14+ New Characters!)
metadata.description:
[h3] REPENTOGON+ IS REQUIRED! [/h3] [i] You know the drill, download Repentogon+ [url=https://repentogon.com/] here! [/url] [/i]
[img] https://file.garden/aYULvni48hrZ2pCM/image.png [/img] [b] ModJam Vol. 2 focuses on CHARACTERS, rather than items! We present a whopping 14(?) characters, 7 normal characters and 7 tainted characters.[/b] Each team had to make a normal character over the span a few weeks, and then was given another team's character to make the tainted for. These characters include...
[h3] BEELZE [/h3] [list] [*] [b]DoodleDude, Kerkel[/b] - Normal [*] [b]Foks[/b] - Tainted [/list] [spoiler]Harness the power of blue flies by using Compost, and use Beelze's more unique blue buddies to your advantage![/spoiler] ⸻ [h3] ROBERT [/h3] [list] [*] [b]Monwil, Skulldier[/b] - Normal [*] [b]DoodleDude, Kerkel[/b] - Tainted [/list] [spoiler]Robert's got a boss to get to. Use your limited time each floor to visit as many special rooms as possible![/spoiler] ⸻ [h3] HAGAR [/h3] [list] [*] [b]Aeronaut, Truji[/b] - Normal [*] [b]Monwil, Skulldier[/b] - Tainted [/list] [spoiler]A frail soul that can use their pocket active, El Roi, to reverse their downsides. Don't use it in boss rooms for a bonus![/spoiler] ⸻ [h3] ANIMA [/h3] [list] [*] [b]Fly_6, EternalNecromancer[/b] - Normal [*] [b]Aeronaut, Truji[/b] - Tainted [/list] [spoiler]A man of many personalities, Anima can take the abilities of the base Isaac roster using his mask.[/spoiler] ⸻ [h3] INFERNUS [/h3] [list] [*] [b]Andre Doruk, Ignatz[/b] - Normal [*] [b]Fly_6, EternalNecromancer[/b] - Tainted [/list] [spoiler]Originating from Deadlock, upgrade your 4 special abilities each floor to unlock them for the rest of the run and to make them more powerful.[/spoiler] ⸻ [h3]CHURCHILL[/h3] [list] [*] [b]Spoop, Split[/b] - Normal [*] [b]Andre Doruk, Ignatz[/b] - Tainted [/list] [spoiler]A robot that requires constant recharge. Wind him up to increase his tearrate for a short while![/spoiler] ⸻ [h3]HART[/h3] [list] [*] [b]Foks[/b] - Normal [*] [b]Spoop, Split[/b] - Tainted [/list] [spoiler]A deer that's able to poison his foes, at the cost of getting Confused upon taking damage. Be careful![/spoiler]
An EXTREME special thanks to [b]Split[/b] for the incredible thumbnail, [b]Kerkel[/b] for compiling all the mods together, and [b]ConBoi[/b] for hosting the event like last time, as well as some minor sprites!
Also thanks to Biddybododode, Gloopy20 and Jane Sorrow for t̵͕͕̯͆͛̉̒̒̚͝͠h̷̖͎̣̦͇̓̑̈̀ȩ̵̢̬̝̼̘͈̄̎̐̂i̵̯̲̲͚̺̋̃̈́̑̄̕r̶͎͍̻̫̦̃̍̑̈́̋͆̾̓ ̴̜̮̠̥͋̐̒̉c̶̩͈̬͕̳͋̑͆͂h̸͉̫̫̓̿̅̆á̸̩̩̟̒ṟ̸̭̿̔ḁ̸͛̊̕͠c̵̗̲̉̊͊̔̅ť̶͎̻̳̳̗̅̃̅̎͝e̴͉̲͔̞̯͎̜̍̿͒̑̈̀͝r̵̢̙̠̘̭̝̀̓̍̄s̵̢͕̟͚͚͍͚͖̿!̴̢̛̫̘͙͓̮̓͛͂̐̃
[i] Check out ModJam Vol. 1 [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3555278833] here [/url] if you haven't seen it! [/i]
